name: Habib Belkziz
description: '''Habib Belkziz''' ([[Arabic]]: حبيب بلقزيز, [[Marrakech]], 9 November 1989) is a Moroccan [[Gnawa music|gnawa]] singer, audio engineer, music producer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist. He released the Album ''Sidi Kmmy'' produced by HaBiBelk Productions Records.
